title: Co-creating and delivering personalized, nature-based VR experiences: Proof-of-concept study with four U.S. adults living with severe COPD
content:

Source: Wellbeing, Space and Society, Volume 7

Author(s): O. McAnirlin, M.H.E.M. Browning, T. Fasolino, K. Okamoto, I. Sharaievska, J. Thrift, J.K. Pope
